mapper.insert: insert into task_instances (task_id, company_id, checklist_id, task_template_id, title, description, status, due_date, assigned_user_id, assigned_department_id, completed_at, created_by, created_at, updated_at) values (#{taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checklistId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskTemplateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dueDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{assignedUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{assignedDepartmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{completedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update task_instances set company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, checklist_id = #{checklistId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, task_template_id = #{taskTemplateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, due_date = #{dueDate,jdbcType=DATE}, assigned_user_id = #{assignedUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, assigned_department_id = #{assignedDepartmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, completed_at = #{completedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where task_id = #{taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select task_id, company_id, checklist_id, task_template_id, title, description, status, due_date, assigned_user_id, assigned_department_id, completed_at, created_by, created_at, updated_at from task_instances where task_id = #{taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select task_id, company_id, checklist_id, task_template_id, title, description, status, due_date, assigned_user_id, assigned_department_id, completed_at, created_by, created_at, updated_at from task_instances
